Do NOT guess. Do NOT proceed.
üìö SOURCE OF TRUTH ORDER (Highest ‚Üí Lowest)

4. Repo documentation
5. Prior chat context
6. Assumptions (must be declared explicitly)

‚ö†Ô∏è OPTIMIZATION GUARD
